attributes.action: The UK government vet all employees for racial cognitive bias and publish
attributes.additional_details: At recruitment of any crown employee or public servant they must undergo a racial cognitive bias test and this score is to be published online.
attributes.background: Vet gov employees root/ branch, top/ bottom for cognitive racial bias. >10% of the UK is non-white yet 'right' and 'left' wing are now racist. Racism is non-definable and we need to root it out.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by "Racism is non-definable and we need to root it out" and how such a test would work. 
	
In any case, petitions need to be started using a real name.
